hero.name: Victorien THOMAS
hero.lead: Aerospace engineering student at IPSA. Passionate about space, development, and technological innovation.

about.title: About
about.text: Currently in the second year at IPSA Paris, specializing in aerospace systems. Curious and motivated, I aim to apply my skills in 3D modeling, programming and design to innovative projects.

experience.title: Experience
experience.esaDesc: 3D modeling of a satellite and OPD structures.
experience.ipsaF1Desc1: Treasurer and head of the construction/design team.
experience.schneiderDesc: Teamwork, quality processes, and innovation within an industrial environment.
experience.meteoDesc: Immersion in meteorology and analysis of forecasting systems.

education.title: Education
education.lycee: Lycée Lamartine – General Baccalaureate, Math & Physics (2019–2022)

projects.title: Projects
projects.esaDesc1: Built a 3D model of an Orbital Propellant Depot (OPD), a refueling satellite designed to extend mission lifespan. The goal is in-orbit refueling, unlocking new possibilities for exploration.
projects.esaDesc2: Modeling in Catia for accuracy and detail; realistic renders and textures in Blender to visualize final appearance and scenarios.
projects.ipsaF1Desc1: Student project: a Formula 1 simulator mounted on actuators. Currently at prototype stage, combining modeling, mechanical design, and electronics.
projects.ipsaF1Desc2: Wooden chassis to validate simulations and load paths. 3D modeling in Catia, communication videos in Blender, and a custom steering wheel. Arduino controls the actuators.
projects.aeroportDesc1: Academic project to transform an existing airport to be as close to carbon-neutral as possible. Aviation accounts for ~5% of global emissions, hence the need for innovation.
projects.aeroportDesc2: Analyzed current infrastructures and proposed renewable energy integration and future technologies to cut consumption and move toward a sustainable airport.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.sportDesc1: Sports have always mattered to me: 8 years of football and 3 years of rowing taught me teamwork, solidarity, and perseverance.
hobbies.sportDesc2: Nowadays I cycle a lot. With two friends we crossed France (~1600 km), a milestone in endurance and pushing limits.
hobbies.patisserieDesc: Cooking relaxes me—especially baking. I enjoy the required precision and the creativity of exploring new flavors to share.
hobbies.musiqueDesc: A passion I discovered recently through friends. Music is a creative outlet; I’ve been playing piano for 3 years.
